text:
Here's a small patch to line up the ISAPI redirector version reported in init_jk.
Also uses JK_EXPOSED_VERSION instead of JK_VERSION so the -dev is picked up on
dev builds.
creator: Tim.Whittington@orionhealth.com

text:
Created attachment 21540
Path to standardise versions reported by ISAPI redirector
creator: Tim.Whittington@orionhealth.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Patch committed (with a minor tweak).

Again, many thanks.
